channel.title: Web host that allows connection to external MySQL db
channel.description:
After spending a few hours attempting to deal with my current webhost (complete with rude customer service) I have decided to migrate to a new host. The host must allow me to connect to a MySQL database hosted on another IP, which my current host does not.
Does anyone know of any hosts which provide this functionality? It is a necessity as my site is the official site of a multiplayer game I am working on and so if I am to have a user control panel I must be able to access external databases.
